#summary Steps to release a new libnfc version.

 * Bump version in files : 
  * Autotools (configure.ac), 
  * CMake (CMakeFiles.txt),
  * and debian files (debian/changelog).
 * Bump API version : "-version-info x:y:z" (libnfc/Makefile.am)
http://www.gnu.org/software/libtool/manual/html_node/Updating-version-info.html
 * Finalise human-readable changelog! (!ChangeLog)
 * Report any important code changes (NEWS)
 * SVN COMMIT!
{{{
export LIBNFC_RELEASE=1.4.2
svn ci -m"Prepare $LIBNFC_RELEASE version"
}}}
 * Check tarball distribution:
{{{
cd /tmp
svn co https://libnfc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
cd trunk
autoreconf -is
./configure
make distcheck
cd ..
rm -rf trunk/
}}}
 * SVN TAG
{{{
svn cp https://libnfc.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ https://libnfc.googlecode.com/svn/tags/libnfc-$LIBNFC_RELEASE -m"TAG: libnfc-$LIBNFC_RELEASE"
}}}
 * Build tarball archive
{{{
cd /tmp
svn co https://libnfc.googlecode.com/svn/tags/libnfc-$LIBNFC_RELEASE
cd libnfc-$LIBNFC_RELEASE
sh make_release.sh
mv libnfc-$LIBNFC_RELEASE.tar.gz libnfc-doc-$LIBNFC_RELEASE.zip ../
cd ..
rm -rf libnfc-$LIBNFC_RELEASE/
}}}
 * Upload archives on http://code.google.com/p/libnfc/downloads/list
 * Update !ChangeLog on http://www.libnfc.org/documentation/changelog
 * Update API at http://www.libnfc.org/api/
 * Announce on forum http://www.libnfc.org/community/forum/1/news-announcements/
